widgets.label:
Port_Utilization_Downlink
DescriptionPort Utilization - Rx (%)
Formula(((%util-rx-curr% * 1000000) / (%maxrate%)) * 100)
Variables
  1. %util-rx-curr% (Int64 / Gauge)
  2. %maxrate% (Int64 / Gauge)

Port_Utilization_Uplink
DescriptionPort Utilization -Tx (%)
Formula(((%util-tx-curr% * 1000000) / (%maxrate%)) * 100)
Variables
  1. %util-tx-curr% (Int64 / Gauge)
  2. %maxrate% (Int64 / Gauge)
